channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Omniverse Workstation Launcher

item.title: CVE-2023-25524|2023-08-03T16:34:47.809Z -- nvidia -- omniverse%20workstation%20launcher
item.description: NVIDIA Omniverse Workstation Launcher for Windows and Linux contains a vulnerability in the authentication flow, where a userâ€™s access token is displayed in the browser user's address bar. An attacker could use this token to impersonate the user to access launcher resources. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to information disclosure.
